# Notes on file types


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

themeCols <- tibble(cols = c("grey", "orange", "green"),
                    hex = c("#5F6062", "#C98C53", "#C9DCB3"))

theme_set(theme_minimal())

```

::: {.callout-tip collapse="false" appearance="simple"}

*Understand that data can be stored in different types of files
*Understand the strengths and limitations of a few example file types for storing different kinds of data
